Reviews.Title: I hunt better with this thing mounted to my TAC-15i Crossbow.
Reviews.Author: Zombie Hunter Prime
Reviews.Content: To mount to a TAC-15i Crossbow picatinny rail you will need an Universal Tilt/Pivot Mount for LCD Displays (10"- 40" Screens) Color: Silver and a Tripod 1/4 inches Screw to Flash Shoe Mount Adapter but you have to saw off the square plate on the screw to get it to fit the Hot Shoe of the Thermal Imager.This is a lot cheaper than buying a Thermal Scope, that are anywhere between $5,000 - $16,000.IR Cameras can only see as far as their light will allow them,but with a Thermal ImagerI can see all the way down my street with this thing, you caneasily see where any and all animals are with this.Can't find your cat or dog, you will with this.It picks up your animals heated foot prints.If you drop something of value in dense brush, scanthe area immediately with this, the object should stillhave your heat on it, making it easier to find.Glass is a Thermal Insulator so you cannot see thru Glass,but you will see your reflection.Find lost children, old people, or hiding crooks.I got this because it is waterproof, so it works if and when you are out in the bush and it pours down on ya.

Reviews.Title: Could have more options for the price
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: The system works well but if moved quickly will stall and also has no zoom except for another 1600 dollar option.Have not tested on a moving boat yet .

Handheld maritime camera with thermal night vision technology
Detects tiny changes in heat and turns them into easy-to-interpret images
Lets you see clearer and farther than ever before in complete darkness
Fully submersible, waterproof enclosure; runs on 4 AA batteries
Measures 9.36 x 2.62 x 3.33 inches (W x H x D); weighs 1.45 pounds
